entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 14 March 2023
